headline: Hubbell CFO Bill Sperry to retire, insider Joseph Capozzoli named successor
summary: Sperry, who has worked at the company for 17 years, will help his successor transition through 2025 and will then continue as Executive Vice President of the company.  Capozzoli, who joined the company in 2013, was most recently vice president, finance, of the company's Electrical Solutions segment.  Previously he worked at Stanley Black & Decker.
